sentences.sContent: Hard wind and bitter cold wizen his face.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hard wind and bitter cold wizen his face.
sentences.sCn: 强风与酷寒使他的脸孔皱缩了。

sentences.sContent: Hard wind and bitter cold wizen his face.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hard wind and bitter cold wizen his face.
sentences.sCn: 强风兴酷寒使他的脸孔皱缩了。

words.tran: 枯萎（wizen的过去式和过去分词）
